snippet: Russia is growing more rigid and intolerant by the day under President Vladimir Putin. Just look at what’s happened so far this week.
abstract: Editorial contends Russia is growing ever more rigid and intolerant to political dissidents by the day under Pres Vladimir Putin; holds Putin's aggressive crackdowns on singers, protesters, Internet users, like trumped-up charges of embezzlement against blogger and activist Aleksei Navalny, and others do not bode well for an open, democratic Russia.
lead_paragraph: Russia is growing more rigid and intolerant by the day under President Vladimir Putin. Just look at what’s happened so far this week.
